name: Verify Manager can change Manager role to User
description:
- Login with valid credentials.
- Create new organization via **API**.
- Signup `second user`.
- Invite `second user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.
- Signup `third user`.
- Invite `third user` to organization with `Manager` role via **API**.

### Verify that:

- `Manager` can change user role from `Manager` to `User`.
- User after changing role from `Manager` to `User`:

- **Cannot** access organization `Settings`.
- **Cannot** access organization `Billing`.
descriptionHtml:
• Login with valid credentials.
  • Create new organization via API.
  • Signup second user.
  • Invite second user to organization with Manager role via API.
  • Signup third user.
  • Invite third user to organization with Manager role via API.

Verify that:

  • Manager can change user role from Manager to User.

  • User after changing role from Manager to User:

  • Cannot access organization Settings.

  • Cannot access organization Billing.
statusMessage:
AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: <<User2>> :: Verify that user role is valid
Message: User regression-c8l9yjhas8@apolo.us role should be User, not Manager!
statusTrace:
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:49: in wrapper
    result = await func(*args, **kwargs)
             ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
tests/test_cases/steps/ui_steps/page_steps_impl/org_people_page_steps.py:49: in verify_ui_valid_user_role_displayed
    assert user_role.lower() == role.lower(), (
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
E   AssertionError: User regression-c8l9yjhas8@apolo.us role should be User, not Manager!

The above exception was the direct cause of the following exception:
tests/test_cases/tests_ui/test_organization_change_member_roles.py:832: in test_manager_change_manager_to_user
    await u2_steps.org_people_page.verify_ui_valid_user_role_displayed(
tests/reporting_hooks/reporting.py:58: in wrapper
    raise AssertionError(formatted_msg) from e
E   AssertionError: [AssertionError] during step: <<User2>> :: Verify that user role is valid
E   Message: User regression-c8l9yjhas8@apolo.us role should be User, not Manager!
